website_summaries.verdict: A solid duvet cover contender praised for its luxurious feel.
pros: Many feel this duvet cover is both soft and sturdy, with a luxe feel for its cost
It also stands out for its smart hidden zipper closure and lightweight feel
cons: Occasional users report that the material feels too thin, and a few received damaged products

customer_reviews.title: The correct dimensions are listed here with photos
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and comfortable. The zipper is very smooth and should last a long time. The dimensions are incorrectly posted on reviews and is not listed on the product description. Here are the actual dimensions: Twin/Twin XL duvet 90 x 69, 2 shams 26 x 20 Full/Queen 90 x 90 2 shams 26 x 20 King/Cal King 104 x 90, 2 shams 36 x 20. Inside of the duvet cover, the ties in each of the 4 corners work very well. My duvet dimensions are 82 x 78. I folded the edges over and tied it with the ties. It works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime member for life

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only moderately happy with this purchase. The duvet cover looks and feels nice, the metieral is very soft and comfortable. After the first wash it was still good, no thread coming undone and no fabric pilling. The reason I’m rating this 3 stars is because the zipper is cheaply made. The metal zipper pull broke off the first time I zipped it up, not only that but the zipper track itself keeps coming undone!!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in white after reading many reviews. It was exactly what I had hoped- soft and comfortable. If you want to put over a colored comforter, I would suggest a color other than white. The material is thin enough that it would show through but still sturdy. This is not a stiff duvet, if that is what you are looking for. It is comfy like you might find in a hotel. I purchased a King for my pillow-top king that requires deep pocket sheets. It fits perfectly. I paired this with this comforter: "Chezmoi Collection King Goose Down Alternative Comforter with Corner Tab, White" because they tie inside so it doesn't slip. I am very happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: The material is very soft which I like a lot
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft which I like a lot. The only issue I've had is the blanket slips around inside it very easily and it's a pain to get it straightened back out. it has ties to attack to a blanket that already has ties but mine doesn't. I ended up sewing loops on the corners of my blanket to tie the duvet to and that's at least made it much easier to spread the blanket out inside the duvet without having to open it back up.
customer_reviews.author: quippers

customer_reviews.title: king size was too small for my king bed.
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is very soft and was so easy to use! However, I had to return it because it was too small! I ordered the king/ calif King size to fit my King duvet and my duvet was bunches up inside of it. Also, it did not cover the sides of my king mattress. I was surprise since it was labeled as a king/California king. Unfortunately I have to send it back and get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: We have even attempted to add additional string to allow a much better fit, but we constantly are adjusting the comforter ...
customer_reviews.text: This duvet has quality material that’s very soft to the touch. BUT, our comforter continues to slide around even with the ties. We have even attempted to add additional string to allow a much better fit, but we constantly are adjusting the comforter within the duvet to the point where it’s become a hassle while making up the bed, and uncomfortable to sleep because the comforter is not spread evenly across the bed. Again touch & feel of this product is amazing, however, the main purpose of the utilization sleep comfortable has not been accomplished. Just Turhible
customer_reviews.author: JBoogi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this purchase. We ordered these for our kids and while the fabric is soft and wrinkle free, I am quite disappointed with how the duvet is slipping away from the comforter. Every morning we find the comforter bunched up into one corner of the duvet, leaving the other areas empty. It is super annoying and now we have the added task to straighten it back out daily. Another problem we encountered is the zipper is not sturdy. After the second wash, the zipper puller fell off and not only that but the zipper track is coming apart. I have buyer’s remorse.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Duvet does not hold up for long
customer_reviews.text: I've had the pillow cases and duvet for about 9 months. It isn't my main duvet cover, so I haven't used it a lot, but even so, it began to pill after maybe a month or so of usage. I know it wasn't super expensive, but I guess I expected it to last longer. I dealt with it for a while, but at 9 months its too uncomfortable to put on the bed anymore. I suppose it would last a while on a guest bed if it wasn't used frequently, but not great for frequent or semi-regular use. The pillow cases are fine for some reason. They don't have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft and would be a great product if it were more durable. One of the duvet ties on the inside ripped off after about 6 months. The zipper broke after about 12 months and the pillow cases started ripping after about 18 months. Maybe this is the standard lifecycle of linens at this price point but all of our past duvet covers/pillow cases have lasted longer than this at that same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Harper

customer_reviews.title: This was so amazing when first purchased
customer_reviews.text: This was so amazing when first purchased!! Little dull after a few washes HOWEVER I have a dog so it's hard to always keep the crisp white. Would still highly recommend for comfort and affordability
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works really well. It is definitely wrinkle-free (even when my husband forgets in the in the dryer all day). Now that we've had ours for a couple years, it's starting to show its dirtiness. That's probably just from us not washing it as often as we should. All-in-all it's a great purchase and I'll probably buy a new one here soon to replace the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndra

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect superior quality for something this inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 weeks of light use and one washing, there are pills and snags all over the place. I didn't expect superior quality for something this inexpensive, but at this point, it's almost unusable because the pilling is so bad and annoying... lesson learned. I'll pay more next time for something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, super soft. I bought the white set. Now all I need to do to "redecorate" my bedroom is change the throw pillows and I have a completely different look for very little money.
customer_reviews.author: Doni Chambers

customer_reviews.title: This duvet is so soft and very nice looking. On the bed
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is so soft and very nice looking. On the bed, it looks great. But but a big blanket to go in it. I had bought a king size. And I have a king size down comforter. And every night I would have to shake it and realign the blanket with in. It shifts and bunches up. Kinda annoying. It also get super warm. I don’t mind during the winter time. But definitely not for summer. You’ll regret it. I do like it and I’m not upset for getting it by all means.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: I really like this duvet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this duvet. I wanted something to put over my comforter and this did the job. It is soft, and convenient with the ties and the zipper, and an amazing price. However, it seems as though there is almost too much fabric on the outside. The ties line up perfectly on the inside, but the comforter come how bunches up constantly and the extra fabric is constantly tangling up which gets annoying. For the price though, it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Minder

customer_reviews.title: Such a lovely duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this fabric; it's so silky and soft and cool. With duvet inserted, it feels like being snuggled up under a big, squashy marshmallow. The matching pillowcases look great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: I love the zipper
customer_reviews.text: This duvet is very soft and washes well. I love the zipper. Trying to button up a duvet is annoying and time consuming. This zips right up. The ties are great - they are long enough so you can tie it well to keep the comforter in place. So far, I am very happy with this duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for my guest room. I love the crisp white color. Very soft. Used my steamer to get the wrinkles out. No regrets or disappointment in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but thin duvet
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Super soft and silky to the touch after one wash Beautiful bright white color Good fit CONS: Thinner than a bed sheet Goose down poking through No ties, only zipper closure
customer_reviews.author: Louise H

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just had bad luck
customer_reviews.text: I think that everyone should have a duvet cover as these make your bed much more comfy. However, the zipper on this broke the first time I used it. Also, one of the corners didn't have a tie down to secure my comforter. Maybe I just had bad luck
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.......
customer_reviews.text: So soft, great quality. I have been looking for a set like this for a long time. Washed it several times already and it still as if i never washed it. Easy to use and has string on the inside to tie the comforter into the corners.
customer_reviews.author: sharon miz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.text: So so soft and fluffy. Got the Queen sized white and it fit perfectly with my duvet and pillows. Was a true white not off white. There were a few strings inside the duvet cover(to be expected at this priuce) but the outside was smooth and frayless. My husband wanted something softer than the duvet itself and this blew him away. Unbeatable for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gadbury

customer_reviews.title: The Right Duvet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a duvet for a while until I came across this one. The material is soft and it's great quality! I highly recommend this product. Only thing I would say is to not be aggressive with the zipper! Zipper broke, duvet over.
customer_reviews.author: UV

customer_reviews.title: Good quality great buy
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Fits my Queen duvet insert perfectly and, has little ties inside the two corners at zipper end to attach to my duvet insert which prevents slipping and crimping of the insert from the cover. Nice touch. Love the sage color , very soft, pastel. Will likely buy more colors in this product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christi vila

customer_reviews.title: and it's perfect! I love this soft duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today, and it's perfect! I love this soft duvet cover! It has a zipper and ties in the corners to keep the comforter in place. Plus, it happens to match my son's curtains perfectly. I'm hoping they make a green one as well for my other son.
customer_reviews.author: crh25

customer_reviews.title: Great THIN Duvet Covers!
customer_reviews.text: These duvet covers come in great colors, are durable, and are soft to the touch. So far, they have exceeded my expectations for good duvet covers. But you should be aware that the covers are thin, so if you are looking for quilted thick duvet covers, then you should look elsewhere.

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap this is such high quality and feels so great ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review I've written on Amazon.... but GET THIS DUVET COVER!!!! Holy crap this is such high quality and feels so great to sleep in. I was looking all over for days to find the right cover and tried this based on the consumer reviews. I am SO happy with this purchase!! The zip close made stuffing this a breeze and each corner does have ties. Will definitely be purchasing again, no doubt!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dial

customer_reviews.title: It is a piece of CRAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap material. Poor quality and the company provides NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sound Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I like this down comforter duvet, but my husband not so much. The duvet slides around even with the corner tie downs. And sometimes he would get tangled in the cover. As you can imagine... this duvet didn’t last in our bed for very long. If you don’t move much when sleeping this is a great duvet. Very soft, easy to wash, and easy to get off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sized properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Beckham king/cal king duvet specifically for a Beckham king/cal king comforter. It's too small, by about 6 inches. So disappointing. I had already washed it before putting it on the comforter, otherwise I'd return in. Quality otherwise seems fine, but the zipper is a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTCSC

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice for how inexpensive this is. It's soft, looks great, and the corner ties keep my down comforter where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: HarpDoc

customer_reviews.title: I love the texture
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture. However, I didn't love that although the duvet cover is a king/california king size, the pillow shams are for twin pillows. This is the 2nd cover I purchased. I'm going to have someone make king shams from the 2nd cover. I couldn't find fabric to match anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: nancy schuman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good nights rest!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! However I wish I can simply return it. It is not breathable at all. It locks in any moisture and makes you sweat/ freeze all night long. I have now had to go out and purchase 2 other blankets to Replace this one. I wish I could return it to get my money back since I’ve already had to replace it and I have used it for only 1 month!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The picture looks like a nice cover but what you receive is like ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks like a nice cover but what you receive is like a sheet but thicker.Same material as a sheet.Even if I put my thick blanket inside the duvet it still will not look like the picture also the sheet was very small not Cali king not even a king at all its more like a full size.
customer_reviews.author: KeeshaB

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is buttery soft but the size for my king is a bit smaller than I wanted. Fits the comforter just fine but based on the photos I expected it to be a bit bigger. Nevertheless this is a wonder value and I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for that soft hotel feel!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Seems small
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is nice but the size seems small. It doesn’t cover the sides of my full king bed the way it shows in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Delta Force 3000

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It is very soft and washed well
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is very soft and washed well. Within the first 2 days of using this my dog had an accident and it became urine soaked. It came clean after one wash (there is nothing a little bit of baking soda, white vinegar and lemon juice can't get out!). I let it air dry and it is still just as soft and bright white.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Soft material till it lasted. The zip on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft material till it lasted. The zip on the cover is opening up on both sides now, and it hasn’t even been 6 months since we’ve started using it. We might have to buy another duvet cover now, and unfortunately will not be going back to this brand
customer_reviews.author: Golden Owner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this duvet cover. I was initially pretty nervous that it wouldn't fit or the comforter inside would end up clumping up like my last duvet cover, but I've never had any issues with this. I love the quality and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Durable, and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. It is amazingly soft, great quality fabric, and holds up well with repeated washes.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bender

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! Can't beat the price either!! I am very picky when it comes to duvet comforters and this definitely exceeded all my expectations!! I have bought over duvets from many stores and nothing compares to this one. I will definitely be ordering a 2nd set.
customer_reviews.author: JessCat

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Color is as shown. Delivery prompt, and well packaged. Well made except the zipper is a little light weight Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Desdoolittle

customer_reviews.title: Great buying decision
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo happy I bought this. Was sort of apathetic towards bedding before and didn’t think it would make much difference but I was so wrong. These have completely changed my bed they are so soft and feel like luxury. I actually bought another one I liked it so much
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Byrholdt

customer_reviews.title: luxury duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars for light weight but in fact it is a nice heavy weight. Love this cover. The pillow shams are missing in action. Trying to find out where they went.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bedding.
customer_reviews.text: This is for my guest room, but I sleep there a lot :) and I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Frank V

customer_reviews.title: Great basic duvet!
customer_reviews.text: This needs higher ratings... I have this duvet on three beds now. It's so soft, can withstand bleach if necessary, and is not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this material so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this material so much! It feels so good on my skin, appears to be of high quality and well made. The color is deep and rich (I ordered purple) and maintains its brightness after washes. So happy with this brand and their products :)
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin11

customer_reviews.title: Color isn’t even CLOSE to the option chosen
customer_reviews.text: This item is a good value for what you pay for. My BIGGEST complaint is that the color isn’t even CLOSE to what the photo shows... and now I can’t return it. So I paid for something I can’t use... but had to buy something else anyway. Glad I didn’t pay more though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft - easy to wash. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KateS

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: Inside cover sometimes moves around but there is ties for one side of it. Also, no sheet needed as it keeps me real warm. I like it
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo soft and nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a down comfortable made to be used with a duvet and then complained. This is soft and nice and I would totally order it again.
customer_reviews.author: RachelFaith

customer_reviews.title: So soft.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but I will say that inserting a light comforter will be a pain to actually have laid out on the bed. the comforter seems to always favor one side. Other than that annoyance this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bralyn J. Ladson

customer_reviews.title: really soft material, but the purple isn’t really as ...
customer_reviews.text: really soft material, but the purple isn’t really as deep as i thought it would be. my blanket and pillow is purple these sheets are more red toned. not sure if i’m gonna keep them or not bc my theme is purple not reddish purple
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed out about my duvet sheet. I was supposed to get a Navy blue, but it turned out more of a dark blue like you would see in a little boy's room. Returning and ordering in a different color. Overall, the set was nice, just not the color advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100 times over!
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed with this duvet cover! It’s incredibly soft and paired with my lightweight down alternative and my Beckham luxury sheets it feels like I’m sleeping in a cloud. They are so soft and comfortable. Best duvet I’ve ever purchased and the price is unbeatable. Would recommend to anyone and everyone. Don’t hesitate you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse#1

customer_reviews.title: Good Material
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable Easy to put comforter in Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Mat

customer_reviews.title: This is good. It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is good. It's easy to use, easy to wash and a good construction. Very soft and I, too appreciate the ties in the inside corners which keep the duvet from shifting around inside. Can't see how it would work, otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The material is nice and soft but it’s too big for our King ...
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and soft but it’s too big for our King down comforter so it’s so uncomfortable to sleep with because I always end up just covered by the cover and not the actual comforter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft but cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: This duvet cover is super soft and easy to install. The only problem I have with it is the zipper. At one point even though it was zipped up, the duvet cover started opening up. I think they could have invested in a better zipper to make this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Stained White Duvet Cover - Unsanitary!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time, but very stained. The duvet cover had brown and pink stains all over it in varying sizes, you can imagine my horror! It was gross and made me want to remove my comforter immediately. I actually joked that the next step was to pass a blacklight all over the item. It's a pity because it felt really soft, but I could not justify such a dirty item. I opened the item 30 minutes ago and already requested a return label. Will be sending back tomorrow. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rivera Llorens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a duvet cover exactly like this one for $80 at a brick and mortar store. It looks good. It help up in the wash really well. And, it’s very soft. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: True white. Sheer but not see through (perfect for CA summers) and WAY soft. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha McKinley-Yunker

customer_reviews.title: Soft, beautiful but transparent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in white. Great sizing, zipper & soft. The material is transparent, so had to put a another white duvet under it to maintain the visual of white
customer_reviews.author: mark sun

customer_reviews.title: But I will say the quality and softness and fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: It's waaaaaaay too big. Get a size smaller. I ordered the king for my down comforter and it's HUGE! But I will say the quality and softness and fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: SCA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this duvet cover. The fabric is heavenly — so soft! Great value and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is lightweight and pretty easy to clean but I do have a stain I can’t get out and the zipper at the bottom broke so I can no longer use it. I’ve had it about 6 months and only washed it 3 times. I followed the care instructions as directed. Very disappointed with the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Big fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and super soft! Zipper closure makes it easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit For Cal King!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel! My advise is to wash before use. Easy to clean and had no issues since I purchased in June. It fits my Cal King pretty well and allows for “hang time” as well. Definitely is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Softest Duvet Ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I was skeptical to order a duvet online without feeling it but all the reviews were great so we went with it. So happy we did because this duvet does not disappoint! It is SO SOFT I can't believe I was thinking about purchasing one four times it's price! I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean look
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture, it is a cover as expected and fits good...
customer_reviews.author: Diva B

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber....
customer_reviews.text: I returned them.... as I realize I really don't like the feeling of microfiber.
customer_reviews.author: Laetitia Longuefosse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover! Easy to wash and texture is wonderful. Never itchy and it keeps you warm!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: all good. Very soft
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything that all of the other reviews said, all good. Very soft, lightweight, bright white duvet with life saving anchor ties inside to set your comforter. Bonus: Shams are Euro size which made me extremely happy. You could not get a better deal for the price. Will definitely order from them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, but oddly shaped. My comforter is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, but oddly shaped. My comforter is bundled up on the sides inside the duvet and has lots of extra fabric on the top and bottom, no matter which way I turn my comforter it doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Windsor

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, beautiful color. It's a pet hair magnet though (I have a cat). I even tried a pet hair remover brush to get the hair off and it wouldn't come off. Seemed kind of stuck in the cover. I would buy it again though. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: cari

customer_reviews.title: Duvet too small for insert - Black is very faded
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately i had to return this item! I have a king size bed and i ordered a California King in this. The duvet was almost 6 inches too short for the king size insert i have. Also it was a very faded black color compared to black pillow cases i already had!
customer_reviews.author: Lendsi

customer_reviews.title: Unfinished/damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Duvet arrived without the ties on one corner. This made the blanket slide around inside the duvet. Every morning I have to open it and try to straighten it out. The cover is soft but extremely cheaply made. Only used it for two weeks before I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: the comforter itself breathes well and keeps you cool; it is the sheet that does not breathe
customer_reviews.text: very soft but does not breathe. you sweat underneath if you have a comforter inside. the comforter itself breathes well and keeps you cool; it is the sheet that does not breathe, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! No complaints. Very soft! Zipper works great. Very convenient to have ties in each corner so the comforter doesn’t move around inside the duvet. Not cheap material!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our guest room and everyone loves it! its super soft and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I thought it would be thicker than it was. But it is still nice. Very soft.
customer_reviews.author: G. Royal

customer_reviews.title: Really big pillow case
customer_reviews.text: Material is not as soft as I would like. The pillow cases are huge, they could probably fit 2 of my pillows in one.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, chic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this duvet! So soft and comfy. I wanted something very simple and chic and that is exactly what this is. I purchased the king for my queen bed (with a king down comforter inside) and I would recommend that if you have a box spring under your mattress. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great! Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Great! Super soft, fit my King sized down comforter nicely. Very impressed for the price. Got the cream color, and it’s very pretty and goes well with my cream colored spread.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so cheap
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a higher priced duvet cover, and honestly- this one is much better. I love the material and how it feels. I’m thinking of buying one for my guest bedroom too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews and was worried. But...IT IS SO SOFT AND NOT FALLING APART! Buying anything is always a gamble. And mine paid off. I love it. Am planning on getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: Please don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are THE WORST. Zipper broke after one day and they look really really cheap. You get what you pay for I guess and now I can't return them because I washed them. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: Duvet came quickly. Was very surprised with how fast it shipped and how super soft it was. Fit my comforter perfectly feels amazing to the touch. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great price on covers
customer_reviews.author: Cbail

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and soft as promised
customer_reviews.text: Super Soft cover. The small detail is pet hair really sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Lovely & Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised after ordering the grey that it had a slight green tinge to it matching the rest of my Restoration Hardware furnishings
customer_reviews.author: Baystaging

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is the third colour in which I have bought this bedding (also got the light blue and white). It breathes extremely well in both hot and colder temperatures, super comfortable and soft. So far, excellent value for money. I want to see how they do over more time (I've only had them a few weeks).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much pilling
customer_reviews.text: This started pilling after the first wash. It wasn’t so bad but after the second wash it got worse. I washed on gentle, cold and turned it inside out like instructed. Didn’t wash it with anything else. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Not a blanket
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a bed spread lmao it’s a mattress cover
customer_reviews.author: Lovebug

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after 2 months and only washing twice. Now my comforter is hanging out on one side
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ughhhhhh-+
customer_reviews.text: The material is absolutely beautiful. The zipper is an ABSOLUTE, EMBARRASING NO! Never zipper buy for your buddy bye...... Learned the hard way. If only they had this in button up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's not wrinkle free at all.and dog hair clings too it. But it's so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very soft fits queen perfect, arrived great condition & timely manor.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this material for the price I paid. I love this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The zipper and pillow covers are also very nice with it
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so soft. I ordered it in white and the fabric is not see through. I always worry about ordering white and the fabric being too sheer. The zipper and pillow covers are also very nice with it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have loved it and had it for over 6 mo. Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Working momma

product_meta.title: Beckham Hotel Collection Luxury Soft Brushed 2100 Series Microfiber Duvet Cover Set - Hypoallergenic - King/California King - Sky Blue
feature_bullets: LUXURY DOUBLE BRUSHED MICROFIBER – The Luxury Soft Brushed 2100 Series Microfiber 3 Piece Duvet Cover Set includes 1 Duvet Cover and 2 Standard Pillow Shams. Simply insert your duvet/comforter into the cover and secure with the corner ties for a fashionable and comfortable night's rest.

HIGH QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP – Our collection is crafted in luxurious 100% double brushed microfiber fabric, and features a zippered closure for simple installation of your duvet/comforter. It is perfect for any room in your home – bedroom, guest room or a kid’s room!

COMFORTABLE & DURABLE – The ultra-soft design provides you with unprecedented comfort. You’ll sleep like a baby! Plus, our brushed microfiber construction is stronger and more durable than cotton. It is sophisticated, stylish, and will keep you comfortable all night long.
EASY CARE & MAINTENANCE – Our design is machine washable! It is also hypoallergenic and dust mite resistant, which makes it perfect for people who are prone to allergies or asthma!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We are so confident in the quality of our product that we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee! If you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the product for a full refund.
